plot: David and Flavie are in love. Unfortunately they are from two different families. While David is on his way to find his soulmate, his own father will take care that they won't meet.
title: Running Away
plot_es: David and Flavie are in love. Unfortunately they are from two different families. While David is on his way to find his soulmate, his own father will take care that they won't meet.
plot_en: David and Flavie are in love. Unfortunately they are from two different families. While David is on his way to find his soulmate, his own father will take care that they won't meet.
